content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear Colleague,\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to our annual Developing Secure Software training. The course is aimed at all the members of GreenSky project and needs to be retaken every year due to Customer policy. Please be aware that all the modules (old and new ones) from the Context should be completed every single time. In the end of the training you will be asked to mark this course complete on the Onboarding Portal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have Linkedin certificate of completion issued this year, you can proceed to the confirmation page of this course. If your certificate issued last year, then you need to take the training as mentioned above.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To take the course please follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/checkpoint/enterprise/login/2113185?pathWildcard=2113185&application=learning&redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Flearning%2Fdeveloping-secure-software%3Fu%3D2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LINK\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions regarding the training, please contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Veranika_Anikeyeva@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Veranika Anikeyeva\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
